trans-unit.source: Navigate to the [Google Cloud Console](https://console.developers.google.com/project) and sign-in with your Google account credentials, and then click **Select a project**, then **Create a project**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the [Google Cloud Console](https://console.developers.google.com/project) and sign-in with your Google account credentials, and then click **Select a project**, then **Create a project**.

trans-unit.source: Enter a project name, accept the terms of service, and click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Enter a project name, accept the terms of service, and click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: If requested, carry out the SMS Verification, and click **Create** again.
trans-unit.target: If requested, carry out the SMS Verification, and click **Create** again.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the project number in the **Projects** section.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the project number in the **Projects** section.

trans-unit.source: Later in the tutorial you set this value as the PROJECT_ID variable in the client.
trans-unit.target: Later in the tutorial you set this value as the PROJECT_ID variable in the client.

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable and manage APIs** under **User Google APIs** and click **Cloud Messaging for Android**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable and manage APIs** under **User Google APIs** and click **Cloud Messaging for Android**.

trans-unit.source: Then on the next page click **Enable API**.
trans-unit.target: Then on the next page click **Enable API**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Credentials**, and then click **Add Credential**->**API Key**
trans-unit.target: Click **Credentials**, and then click **Add Credential**->**API Key**

trans-unit.source: In **Create a new key**, click **Server key**.
trans-unit.target: In **Create a new key**, click **Server key**.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the **API KEY** value.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the **API KEY** value.

trans-unit.source: You will use this API key value to enable Azure to authenticate with GCM and send push notifications on behalf of your app.
trans-unit.target: You will use this API key value to enable Azure to authenticate with GCM and send push notifications on behalf of your app.
